fields.label: Header Scripts (Higher Priority)
fields.name: mandr_site_header_scripts_hi_p_code
fields.instructions: Text added here will be echoed early into the wp_head hook of every page and post on the site. This is where Google Tag Manager's main script should go.

fields.label: Header Scripts (Lower Priority)
fields.name: mandr_site_header_scripts_lo_p_code
fields.instructions: Text added here will be echoed later into the wp_head hook of every page and post on the site. This is where Schema should go.

fields.label: Opening Body Scripts
fields.name: mandr_site_body_scripts_code
fields.instructions: Text added here will be echoed just after the opening <body> tag on every page and post on the site. This is where Google Tag Manager's body scripts should go. NOTE: This requires WordPress 5.2 and that the theme has the 'wp_body_open()' function added after the opening body tag.

fields.label: Footer Scripts
fields.name: mandr_site_footer_scripts_code
fields.instructions: Text added here echoes in the wp_footer hook.
